document_data.name: Restore Spirit
document_data.mainbody: '''''Restore spirit''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: With this spell, a shugenja was able to return a wandering or lost spirit to its body. During casting, the shugenja placed their hands on the body. If the spell was successful, the spirit returned instantly to its body. Shugenja were often asked by [[wu jen]] to cast this spell to correct mishaps from certain spells involving the spirit leaving the body such as ''[[spirit self]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a red robe.
